text: Eadward kyng gret wel <mine> biscopas & mine eorlas & ealle mine ðegnas on þam scyrum þær Sancte Peter into Westmynstre hafað <land> inne & menn freondlice.

& ic kyðe eow þæt ic hæbbe gegyfen hym on eallum hys lande saca & socna, toll & team, infangeneþeof & flymene fyrmþe, griðbrice & hamsocne & foresteall & ealle oðre gerihtu inne tid & ut of tid, binna burh & butan burh, on stræte & of stræte swa full & swa forð swa hi me sylfon fyrmest on handan stodon.
& ic nelle geþafian þæt ænig mann hæbbe ænigne onsting ofer hys land ne ofer hys menn be strande ne be lande ne on wuda ne on felda buton se abbod & þa gebroðru to ðæs mynstres neode.
